column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: package. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix ex: <http://www.example.org/> .ex:Package rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Package"@en ;    rdfs:comment "A box or bag in which things are packed for transport, storage, or sale."@en .ex:hasWeight rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Package ;    rdfs:range xsd:float ;    rdfs:label "has weight"@en ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a package to its weight."@en .ex:hasSize rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Package ;    rdfs:range ex:Size ;    rdfs:label "has size"@en ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a package to its size."@en .ex:Size rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Size"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The overall dimensions or magnitude of a thing."@en .ex:hasContent rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Package ;    rdfs:range ex:Content ;    rdfs:label "has content"@en ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a package to its content."@en .ex:Content rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Content"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The things that are held or included in something."@en .```
